text: Tell me a short story about a magical forest.
summary: Once upon a time, an ancient forest brimming with mystic creatures thrived under a perpetual moonlight.

text: Write a short poem about the sunset.
summary: Golden hues kiss the horizon, fading gently into twilight.

text: Give me a list of healthy breakfast ideas.
summary: Oatmeal with berries, avocado toast, green smoothies, and scrambled egg whites.
